main event: Two Air Police observed a cylindrical object flying at high speed over Las Vegas in 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as cylindrical, about the size of a B-36,Without wings or tail,The sighting lasted for only 10 seconds,The object was seen traveling northeast at a phenomenal speed at an altitude of approximately 10,000 feet,The conclusion stated that there was insufficient data for firm evaluation despite the details available.
witness description: Air Police in a C-47 aircraft
